item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, November 18, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. We are shutting down the Ondsel FreeCAD business (21 points | 2 comments)

7. AlphaProof's Greatest Hits (179 points | 86 comments)

10. You could have designed state of the art positional encoding (80 points | 9 comments)

21. 1 in 5 Japanese Workers in Their 20s Turn to Resignation Agencies (112 points | 85 comments)
22. Constraints in Go (175 points | 70 comments)

24. Samantha Harvey's 'beautiful and ambitious' Orbital wins Booker prize (25 points | 10 comments)
25. Why did Windows 95 setup use three operating systems? (199 points | 91 comments)
26. Nokolexbor: Drop-in replacement for Nokogiri. 5.2x faster at parsing HTML (27 points | 1 comment)
27. Show HN: Store and render ASCII diagrams in Obsidian (42 points | 6 comments)
28. Wiby – Search Engine for the Classic Web (11 points | 1 comment)
29. A Taxonomy of AgentOps (48 points | discuss)
